Blast Shower.desc: Cleanse all negative effects. Includes debuffs, damage over time, and nearby projectiles.

Disposable Missile Launcher.desc: Fire a swarm of 12 missiles that deal 12x300% damage.

Eccentric Vase.desc: Create a quantum tunnel of up to 1000m in length. Lasts 30 seconds.
Eccentric Vase.quote: Create a quantum tunnel between two locations.

Effigy of Grief.desc: ALL characters within are slowed by 50% and have their armor reduced by 20.
Effigy of Grief.quote: Drop an effigy that cripples ALL characters inside. Can be picked back up.

Foreign Fruit.desc: Instantly heal for 50% of your maximum health.

Fuel Array.desc: Looks like it could power something. EXTREMELY unstable...
Fuel Array.quote: Looks like it could power something. EXTREMELY unstable...

Glowing Meteorite.desc: Rain meteors from the sky, damaging ALL characters for 600% damage per blast. Lasts 20 seconds.
Glowing Meteorite.quote: Rain meteors from the sky, hurting both enemies and allies.

Gnarled Woodsprite.desc: Gain a Woodsprite follower that heals for 1.5% of your maximum health/second. Can be sent to an ally to heal them for 10% of their maximum health.
Gnarled Woodsprite.quote: Heal over time. Activate to send to an ally.

Helfire Tincture.desc: Ignite ALL characters within 8m. Deal 5% of your maximum health/second as burning to yourself. The burn is 0.5x stronger on allies, and 24x stronger on enemies.
Helfire Tincture.quote: Burn everything nearby... including you and allies.

Jade Elephant.desc: Gain 500 armor for 5 seconds.

Milky Chrysalis.desc: Sprout wings and fly for 15 seconds. Gain +20% movement speed for the duration.

Ocular HUD.desc: Gain +100% Critical Strike Chance for 8 seconds.
Ocular HUD.quote: Gain 100% Critical Strike Chance for 8 seconds.

Preon Accumulator.desc: Fires preon tendrils, zapping enemies within 35m for up to 600% damage/second. On contact, detonate in an enormous 20m explosion for 4000% damage.
Preon Accumulator.quote: Fire a ball of energy that electrocutes nearby enemies before detonating.

Primordial Cube.desc: Fire a black hole that draws enemies within 30m into its center. Lasts 10 seconds
Primordial Cube.quote: Fire a black hole that draws enemies in.

Radar Scanner.desc: Reveal all interactables within 500m for 10 seconds.

Recycler.desc: Transform an Item or Equipment into a different one. Can only be converted into the same tier one time.
Recycler.quote: Transform an Item or Equipment into a different one. Can only recycle once.

Royal Capacitor.desc: Call down a lightning strike on a targeted monster, dealing 3000% damage and stunning nearby monsters.
Royal Capacitor.quote: Call down a lightning strike on a targeted monster.

Sawmerang.desc: Throw three large saw blades that slice through enemies for 3x400% damage. Also deals an additional 3x100% damage per second while bleeding enemies. Can strike enemies again on the way back.
Sawmerang.quote: Throw a fan of buzzing saws that come back to you.

Spinel Tonic.desc: Drink the Tonic, gaining a boost for 20 seconds. Increases damage by +100%. Increases attack speed by +70%. Increases armor by +20. Increases maximum health by +50%. Increases passive health regeneration by +300%. Increases movespeed by +30%. When the Tonic wears off, you have a 20% chance to gain a Tonic Affliction, reducing all of your stats by -5% (-5% per stack).
Spinel Tonic.quote: Gain a massive boost to ALL stats. Chance to gain an affliction that reduces ALL stats.

The Back-up.desc: Call 4 Strike Drones to fight for you. Lasts 25 seconds.
The Back-up.quote: Call drones for back up. Lasts 25 seconds.

The Crowdfunder.desc: Fires a continuous barrage that deals 100% damage per bullet. Costs $1 per bullet. Cost increases over time.
The Crowdfunder.quote: Toggle to fire. Costs gold per bullet.

Volcanic Egg.desc: Turn into a draconic fireball for 5 seconds. Deal 500% damage on impact. Detonates at the end for 800% damage.
Volcanic Egg.quote: Transform into a speeding draconic fireball, dealing damage as you pass through enemies.
